text:
inKind | Senior Software Engineer | Full Time | Onsite | Austin, TX

We're a restaurant hospitality and financing company. If you're as passionate about food & wine as we are, would enjoy working with us in our downtown Austin company house where we cook and drink often, and have loads of experience building and maintaining a software stack, let's chat.

Wondering about our tech stack? Docker, Rails, MySQL, and Redis on AWS. React Native mobile apps.

Email me directly at miles@inkind.com.
